awd_titl_txt: Scaling Effects in Centrifuge Models of Granular Slope      Instability (Engineering)
awd_abstract_narration: This project will provide the principal investigator with the                   opportunity to conduct advanced research not possible at her home               institution and to interact with students and colleagues through                teaching, counseling, and mentoring activities in a way that                    demonstrates her career in science.  This project furthers VPW program          objectives which are:  (1) to provide opportunities for women to                advance their careers in engineering and in the disciplines of science          supported by NSF and (2) to encourage women to pursue careers in                science and engineering by providing greater visibility for women               scientists and engineers employed in industry, government, and academic         institutions.
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF COLORADO
